summary: Transmute ore spell tweak, to make all iron ores to silver with one cast, and silver to gold.
descriptionHtml:
This is script file changes Transmute ore spell, with that fix you can transform all iron ores to silver, after that you can transform silver ores to gold.
I made it because sometime i need silver ingots, and that spell can make only one silver ore after that make it to gold.
This script can be installed with \"Wrye Bash - Skyrim\" or manual.

Manual: unpack rar file into DATA folder inside a game folder
example: \"D:\\Games\\Skyrim\\Data\" - here you are extract file :)

Tested and work it perfect.

PS: Sorry for bad english :)
author: RS_Demon
